SEARCH
Module VetAppointmentPortal
Package com.vetportal.service

Class ServiceManager

java.lang.Object
com.vetportal.service.ServiceManager
public class ServiceManager extends Object
Singleton service manager responsible for initializing and managing application-wide services.

This class creates and shares a single database connection and makes service-layer objects (like CustomerService and EmployeeService) accessible throughout the application.

The connection is automatically closed when close() is called.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    ServiceManager()
    Initializes the ServiceManager by creating a database connection and instantiating services.

    • close

      public void close()
